container-title: Annals of Mathematics and Artificial Intelligence

items.abstract:
<jats:p>This paper presents a comparative study of polyurethane wear in abrasive soil mass. Two types of polyurethanes
of various chemical compositions and untreated 38GSA steel were tested, the latter being used as a reference
standard. The study was conducted in a natural soil mass at a “rotating bowl” stand. Relative wear resistance
was determined from measurements of mass wear for the materials under study. The conditions of the surface
of the materials under wear tests were analysed.

</jats:p>
title:
TRIBOLOGICAL PROPERTIES OF POLYURETHANES
IN ABRASIVE SOIL MASS
